altername_name: Mario Kart Wii Deluxe Blue Edition
name: Mario Kart Wii Deluxe: Blue Edition
overview: Mario Kart Wii Deluxe is a custom track distribution created by FJRoyet. It features all available retro tracks from SNES to Wii U/Mario Kart Tour in their original order. This also features retro tracks from other games and custom tracks that the author finds to be, to date, the best visually, giving a total of 656 tracks and 10 battle arenas. It also includes new features such as Fake Item Boxes that appear completely identical to regular item boxes, modified statistics of all vehicles and many more features to give a better gameplay experience. Blue Edition features custom vehicles. Green Edition features custom characters. Red Edition features custom skins. All editions features the same 656 tracks, 10 battle arenas and same music tracks for each course. Each edition has a slightly different theme (mainly different colors and images) + own soundtrack in some sections of the game, like menus.
